problems.title: Majority Element
problems.description: A majority element in an array of size n is an element that appears more than n/2 times. Find the majority element of an array. If no majority element exists, print "There are no Majority Elements in the given array".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
8
4 8 4 6 7 4 4 8

Sample Output
There are no Majority Elements in the given array

testCases.expectedOutput: There are no Majority Elements in the given array
There are no Majority Elements in the given array

hintsList: Use a hash map to count frequencies or use Moore's Voting Algorithm.
